issue.title: [Doc] Warnings when buiding docs
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15433](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15433). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15433?focusedCommentId=17481672) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
